}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''[[Lenovo]]''' FRU PN:00JT478 (IBM/Lenovo) #EC:856256
*[[Lite-On WCBN807B]] Broadcom BCM94356Z NGFF M.2 (2230) ([http://www.aliexpress.com/item/Broadcom-BCM94356Z-Wireless-AC-NGFF-FRU-00JT478-Wifi-802-11ac-867Mbps-Bluetooth-BT-4-1-Wlan/32605400794.html AE])
This module would appear to be using an NGFF (M.2) interface. :BCM94356Z, BCM94356ZAE (key A+E)
Linux driver: [[brcmfmac]] - [http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Drivers/brcm80211 brcm80211] (3.17+)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.tonymacx86.com/network/104850-guide-airport-pcie-half-mini-v2-76.html ''List of PCIe / NGFF devices'' on '''tonymacx86''' forums] *[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/pub?key=0Arr23WYNror4dHNPbUVyakY5THExY0tNbU5hR2xaR1E&gid=1 ''Compatibility table for NGFF modules (with photo)'' on '''Skvo'''] *[http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/304356-m2-wireless-cards/ ''M.2 wireless cards'' on '''InsanelyMac''' forums]
===[[Bluetooth devices]]=== *Lenovo (China) BCM4356A2 NGFF Combo Card :[0a5c:640e] BCM4356 (Bluetooth 4.1 USB) *Acer (Lite-On) BCM4356A2 NGFF Card :[04ca:2013] BCM4356 (Bluetooth 4.0 USB) *Asus (Lite-On) BCM4356A2 NGFF Card :[04ca:2014] BCM4356 (Bluetooth 4.0 USB) *Asus ([[AzureWave Wireless Adapters|AzureWave]]) BCM4356A2 NGFF Card :[0b05:181d] Asus MB (Bluetooth USB module) :[13d3:3473] BCM4356 (Bluetooth USB module) :[13d3:3485] AzureWave AW-CB217NF (BT) :[13d3:3488] AzureWave AW-CB210NF (BT) :[13d3:3492] BCM4356 (Bluetooth USB module) *Acer (Foxconn) BCM4356A2 NGFF Card (OUI: 24:FD:52) :[0489:e097] BCM4356 (Bluetooth 4.0 USB)
==See also== *[[AzureWave AW-CB210NF]] Broadcom BCM4356 NGFF M.2 (2230) BT 4.1 *[[AzureWave AW-CB217NF]] Broadcom BCM4356 M.2 (1216) Soldered Down *[[Lite-On WCBN802B]] Broadcom BCM94352Z NGFF M.2 (2230) ([http://i57.fastpic.ru/big/2014/0313/b0/f7d97e68dc41ea307297c3c75eeac1b0.jpg image])
